tentang.keterangan: We are located at the equator island of Indonesia which has alluvial soil which is still green and farming as a majority population. That's  cause us want to help them by selling their agricultural products.
tentang.descVisi: Makmur Kita Perkasa as a trading company whose agricultural products from Indonesia specially from west borneo.
tentang.descMisi1: Improving farmer's life quality through selling their agricultural products.
tentang.decsMisi2: Educate farmers to be more productive to produce a products according international standards.
tentang.desctujuan1: Reduce farmers' poverty by selling their agricultural products.
tentang.desctujuan2: Educate farmers how to produce International standards products.

komitmen.decs: Ongoing commitment/efforts to partners that affect the company's economic performance
komitmen.desckaryawan: Increase employee remuneration in the coming year.
komitmen.descpemasok: Increase the number of suppliers to meet the needs.
komitmen.descpemerintah: Increase sales outside to generate foreign exchange.
komitmen.desclokal: Increase the amount of donations to children who cannot afford it.

pengadaan.descrelasi: Ongoing commitment/effort to maintain relationships with suppliers/improve local suppliers:
pengadaan.listrelasi1: Add local suppliers in west Kalimantan region.
pengadaan.listrelasi2: Regular communication with suppliers to inform product criteria in accordance with standards.
pengadaan.listrelasi3: Build a standard system of raw materials.

produk.descaloe: Plants that grow in tropical and subtropical climates that can be applied in the food industry, pharmacy, and beauty products.
produk.descbetel: Monocots plants classified as palms that grow as tropical plants.
produk.desclalpari: Is a dried flower bud that is widely used as a cooking spice to provide aromatics and is used in cigarettes.
produk.desclalpari4: Packing : 50kg jute/pp bag or customer request
produk.coffebubukdesc: Real ground coffee is in the form of packaging.
produk.mengawasi: How to monitor the impact of business on the environment and society?
produk.descmengawasi: Communicate directly with the public Education programs partners, suppliers and consumers, providing advice and complaint facilities via email and whatsapp.

keberlangsungan.bahan: Ongoing commitment/efforts to increase the use of environmentally friendly/recycled raw materials.
keberlangsungan.descbahan: Try to travel to make sure the products sold are in accordance with the applicable rules.
keberlangsungan.descefisiensi: Just use sunlight to dry it.
